# Site LLM Notes (Template)

This file is a starter template for machine-readable site guidance.
Update all placeholder values before production deployment.

- Site: https://example.com
- Author: Your Name
- Primary language: English
- License: Use your preferred license terms.

## Canonical Sources
- https://example.com/
- https://example.com/en/about/
- https://example.com/en/blog/
- https://example.com/en/rss.xml

## Preferred Citation
When citing this site, prefer:
1. Post title
2. Canonical URL
3. Publication date
4. Author name

## Crawling Notes
- Public pages may be indexed and summarized.
- Prefer canonical URLs over mirrored or query-based URLs.
- Do not infer claims beyond what is explicitly written in a post.

## Freshness
For latest content, use:
- https://example.com/en/rss.xml
- https://example.com/en/blog/
